alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:17AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and northeastern Scott Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 417 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenwood, or 15 miles southwest of Charleston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Paris... Mansfield... Magazine... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Echo... Caulksville... Barber... Union Hill... Lucas... Chismville... Carbon City... Driggs... Sugar Grove... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... Elm Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
